events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store but I need to return it because it does not fit, and I would like a refund.
The system has detected keywords related to a refund request and assigned the cluster as Refund.
The case has been assigned to support agent John to handle the customer’s refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with the return and refund process for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can assist you further?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket fits too tight around the shoulders, so I want to return it.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund once we receive the returned jacket. I will email you the return label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate your quick response and look forward to receiving the return label.
The return label has been sent to your email. Please send the item back so we can complete your refund promptly.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received the return label and if you need any additional assistance with the refund.
Yes, I received the label and have already sent the jacket back. Thank you for your help along the way!
We have processed your refund successfully. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
We’ve sent a short survey to get your feedback on your refund experience. Your input helps us improve our service.
I completed the survey and rated my experience as very good. Thanks for the smooth and helpful support.
The case has now been closed following successful refund processing and positive customer feedback.
